timeline.message:
Updated the doclet to the new API

The com.sun.javadoc API has been deprecated with Java 9 in favor of
jdk.javadoc.doclet. Since the JSPDoclet is used to generate the API
docs, an update to the new API would have been needed at some point

timeline.author: renner

timeline.message:
Remove unused EnforcementDoclet

This doclet was used to ensure there is no non-static or final member in
the struts actions. This was only used by the build.xml checkstyle
target that is not even used in the spec file.

Updated the doclet to the new API

The com.sun.javadoc API has been deprecated with Java 9 in favor of
jdk.javadoc.doclet. Since the JSPDoclet is used to generate the API
docs, an update to the new API would have been needed at some point
